status.title: Lease status
status.description: The lease state indicating where in its life cycle the lease is.

expirydate.title: Expiry date
expirydate.description:
The expiry date after which an OFFERED lease is no longer available to ACCEPT.
This property would be set by the service making an offer to indicates how long a client has before it must accept the offer to reserve the lease.

startdate.title: Start date
startdate.description: The date/time when the lease starts.

enddate.title: End date
enddate.description:
The date/time when the lease ends. Any task still executing after this point may be
                terminated and any resources associated with the lease may no longer be available
                unless they have been explicitly reserved beyond the end of the lease.

platform.title:
Compute
                platform
platform.description:
A description of the ComputePlatform where the Lease
                would be executed. This primarily for human consumption, providing the user with
                additional information to help them choose which lease to
            select.

task.title:
Task
                description
task.description:
A description of the ExecutableTask including
                deatils of the compute, data and storage resources needed to execute
                it.
